class.name: ActivityQuery
class.description: The ActivityQuery class allows constructing queries for fetching activities from the Torii indexer, supporting filtering by caller addresses, time range, namespaces, and world addresses.

method.name: caller_addresses
method.description: Sets the caller addresses to filter by.

method.name: from_time
method.description: Sets the start time for the query.

method.name: namespaces
method.description: Sets the namespaces to filter by.

method.name: to_time
method.description: Sets the end time for the query.

method.name: world_addresses
method.description: Sets the world addresses to filter by.
